main.name: Taylor Dragoo
main.description: With a passion for web applications, UX and sound design
main.bio: I graduated from the University of Central Oklahoma in 2013 with a Bachelor of Applied Technology in Sound Design. After graduating, I spent the following three years as a sound editor and designer on multiple feature-length films that went on to be showcased on Netflix and at Comic-Con International.
main.bio2: I took the knowledge gained from being a sound editor and decided to pursue a second Bachelor’s degree, After looking at different programs, I began the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science program online at Fort Hays State University.
main.bio3: Prior to starting my Computer Science degree I had begun my career as an IT Support Analyst at the University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center which is where I still currently reside.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Applied Technology in Sound Design

work.title: IT Support Analyst
work.description1: Responded to service-related, support emails and calls via Helpdesk; escalating issues as required according to standard operating procedures
work.description2: Documented issues and updated technical articles
work.description3: Provided guidance on software configuration best practices to client’s specific infrastructure requirements
work.description4: Managed user accounts and access in Microsoft Active Directory, Exchange Management Console and Office365 Cloud Exchange Management Console.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
